thread.title: SutiHR’s Recent Updates Facilitate Improved Navigation and Ease of Use
thread.title_full: SutiHR’s Recent Updates Facilitate Improved Navigation and Ease of Use

author: Carol Slone
title: SutiHR’s Recent Updates Facilitate Improved Navigation and Ease of Use
text:
SutiSoft, a leading provider of integrated business productivity platforms and standalone applications today announces the addition of new updates to multiple modules in SutiHR, its human resource management software platform. The recent updates improve navigation within the solution to make it more intuitive. Updates include:
 Added ‘Allow all employees (exempt/non-exempt) to Clock In/Out from dashboard’ checkbox option in unit settings. Admins can now import employee timesheets in excel formal.
 Added Offer Letter template options. While enrolling in a 401K plan, employees can specify the contribution amount in dollars or percentage of their pay period salary.
 Subordinate option (creating time off on behalf of other employees) will be displayed only to reporting authorities or HR administrators.
To learn more about the solution, please visit http://www.sutihr.com or call us on 650-969-SUTI
About Sutisoft:
Sutisoft provides a comprehensive suite of cloud-based business solutions for companies of all sizes. The suite includes scalable and easy-to-use solutions for HR, Payroll, Employee Travel & Expense, ERP, CRM, Document management, Business data analytics, and Electronic signature. This allows small, med-size, and enterprise customers to control costs and save time through use of integrated solutions. Headquartered in Los Altos, California, SutiSoft also has regional offices in Germany, India, and Japan. Additional information is available at http://www.sutisoft.com .
